CustomField.description: If checked, API calls will be sent to Production Marketing Cloud in a sandbox. Use with caution, and ensure that this is UNCHECKED after testing in UAT.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, API calls will be sent to Production Marketing Cloud in a sandbox. Use with caution, and ensure that this is UNCHECKED after testing in UAT.
CustomField.label: Sandbox Publish to Prod
